Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth, I am offering it to you for $180. This price reflects the superior quality, functionality, and the exclusive features that come with this product. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
